name: Castelli Anima 3 Short Sleeve Jersey - Women's
description: A performance jersey with feminine styling. This light jersey won't be out of place on weekend group rides or solo spins. All the right details are covered from a trio of back drop-in pockets to a gripped hem that keeps the back in place. Made with soft breathable fabrics, you'll stay cool even when it's hot out.ProSecco Strada Donna fabric is soft, moisture wicking and highly breathable.Gripped hem with a drop tail provides good coverage.Full length YKK® Vislon zipper lets you vent.3 back drop-in pockets.Reflective details.
